{{ product.ProductID }} {{ product.Name }} {{ product.ProductNumber }} {{ product.Color || 'N/A' }} {{ product.StandardCost | currency }} {{ product.ListPrice | currency }} {{ product.Size || 'N/A' }} {{ product.Weight || 'N/A' }} {{ product.ProductCategoryID || 'N/A' }} {{ product.ProductModelID || 'N/A' }} {{ product.SellStartDate | date:'short' }} {{ product.SellEndDate ? (product.SellEndDate | date:'short') : 'N/A' }} {{ product.DiscontinuedDate ? (product.DiscontinuedDate | date:'short') : 'N/A' }} {{ product.ThumbnailPhotoFileName || 'N/A' }} {{ product.RowGuid }} {{ product.ModifiedDate | date:'short' }}

Nenhum produto encontrado.

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ProductService } from '../service/product.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', }) export class HomeComponent { products: any[] = []; // Variável para armazenar os produtos loading = false; // Indicador de carregamento constructor(private productService: ProductService) { } fetchProducts(): void { this.loading = true; this.productService.getProducts().subscribe( (response) => { this.products = response; // Armazena os produtos this.loading = false; }, (error) => { console.error('Erro ao buscar produtos:', error); this.loading = false; } ); } }
